poses.name: Tadasana (Mountain Pose)
steps: Stand tall with feet together, shoulders relaxed.
Raise your arms overhead, palms facing each other.
Stretch your entire body upward.
Hold for 30 seconds, breathe deeply.

poses.name: Vrikshasana (Tree Pose)
steps: Stand straight, bend one leg and place foot on inner thigh.
Balance on the other leg.
Join palms in prayer position at chest.
Hold for 30 seconds then switch legs.

poses.name: Bhujangasana (Cobra Pose)
steps: Lie on stomach, place palms under shoulders.
Inhale and lift chest off the floor.
Keep elbows slightly bent and shoulders relaxed.
Hold for 15–30 seconds.
